plugin.name: resize
plugin._long: A plugin to resize windows by dragging them from any part (not just the edges).

option.name: activate
option._long: When the specified button is held down, you can drag windows to resize them.

option.name: up
option._long: Shrink window vertically by its bottom edge.

option.name: down
option._long: Grow window vertically by its bottom edge.

option.name: left
option._long: Shrink window horizontally by its right edge.

option.name: right
option._long: Grow window horizontally by its right edge.
